task.name: hifa_flagtargets
task.description:
The hifa_flagtargets task performs basic flagging operations on a list of science target MeasurementSets.
Output
results -- If pipeline mode is 'getinputs' then None is returned. Otherwise the results object for the pipeline task is returned.
Description
The hifa_flagtargets data performs basic flagging operations on a list of measurements including:
o applying a flagging template
Issues

param.name: vis
param.shortdescription: List of input MeasurementSets to flag
param.description: The list of input MeasurementSets. Defaults to the list of MeasurementSets defined in the pipeline context. (can be set only in 'interactive mode')

param.name: template
param.description: Apply flagging templates. (can be set in any pipeline mode)

param.name: filetemplate
param.shortdescription: File that contains the flagging template
param.description: The name of a text file that contains the flagging template for issues with the science target data etc. If the template flags files is undefined a name of the form 'msname_flagtargetstemplate.txt' is assumed. (can be set in any pipeline mode)

param.name: pipelinemode
param.description: The pipeline operating mode. In 'automatic' mode the pipeline determines the values of all context defined pipeline inputs automatically. In interactive mode the user can set the pipeline context defined parameters manually. In 'getinputs' mode the user can check the settings of all pipeline parameters without running the task.

param.name: flagbackup
param.shortdescription: Backup pre-existing flags before applying new ones
param.description: Back up any pre-existing flags. (can be set only in 'interactive mode')

param.name: dryrun
param.shortdescription: Run the task (False) or display the command (True)
param.description: Run the commands (False) or generate the commands to be run but do not execute (True).

param.name: acceptresults
param.shortdescription: Add the results into the pipeline context
param.description: Add the results of the task to the pipeline context (True) or reject them (False).

task.example:
1. Do basic flagging on a science target MeasurementSet:
hifa_flagtargets()
